data.name: Killer 19
data.detailed_description:
Super discount

Thank you for your support! What we want to say is: from 6.24, you will get 50% discount! Wish list will come true at this moment!


Netizen: What happened to the plot?

Then wait for your support. Your support is our greatest motivation, and every evaluation is an encouragement to us! We will make subsequent versions faster and release them in DLC form!


About the Game

#In advance, it comes from two primary school students.#

play a killer of amnesia - killer 19 series games come on stage.

"It's a good feeling to strike. It's a good feeling to kill! This is the real feast ——Player Reviews.
The thick and thin level plot, the joyful feeling of killing and poking, will disappear in your memory when the sharp blade passes the other person's body without leaving blood;
The bizarre flow of the plot, the elusive weight of the decision, in you scold the other side, showing your disgust for all fatuous ideas, slowly may also be hidden;
The heart shaking idea of killing people and the unbreakable firmness of holding the sword show the feeling of heartless indifference and shock when you draw the sword to the other side, but it will be recorded forever like sin

how to play

This game is a horizontal version of the action plot game, you may need a little bit of thinking to choose your way of speaking, level may have some difficulty.

key position introduction

You can use W key to jump, s key to squat to avoid bullets, a key to move left, D key to move right. When you press the CTRL key (you also need to press the A or D key), you can run. When you press the e key, you can use the bullet time function.

what will you play in the game?

A total of 6 days of level, every day there are different wonderful branch level. The difficulty will go from easy to difficult, and will not remain difficult from beginning to end.
We retain a strong sense of attack, killing without leaving blood, and the design of turning into smoke is even more shocking!

data.short_description: Killer 19 is a storyboard game created by skyline studio. Its highlight is the story. Unpredictable plot, more hidden levels, waiting for your experience.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Generally speaking, it's good, but the style of the game is a little crude, but the plot and the sense of attack are quite profound. But before moon game was a bit fake.”
Good – Anonymous comments

“What surprised me was that this game was created by several primary school students.”
Good – User - From Tencent QQ
